p: Eighty-nine (89) constituents were identified in the hemp EO, belonging to monoterpenes, sesquiterpenes and cannabinoids, although not all constituents were found in all of the distillation timeframe (DT) fractions ( Supplementary Tables S2 and S3). The essential oil (EO) sampled at different time points during the hydrodistillation of either ground or non-ground hemp material had a dissimilar profile, as individual EO constituents come out at different times ( Supplementary Tables S2 and S3). We statistically analyzed only 26 constituents, with the highest concentration in the EO. As indicated in the Materials and Methods section, Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) of a 2 × 5 factorial design was completed to determine the significance of the main and interaction effects of Material (two levels: Ground and Nonground) and Distillation Time (DT; 5 levels: 0–5 min, 5–10 min, 10–20 min, 20–80 min, and 80–120 min) on 26 constituents.
